titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to provide for the application of mandatory minimum maturity standards applicable to all domestic and imported Hass avocados.
Hass Avocado Quality Assurance Act of 2007
Hass Avocado Quality Assurance Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Hass Avocado Quality Assurance Act of 2007 - Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for mandatory minimum maturity standards for all domestic and imported Hass avocados sold to consumers in California.
Provides exceptions for commercial processing and charitable and relief uses.
Sets forth penalty provisions.
